评论详情: This dress is beautiful. The colors are vibrant, the fabric material is light and breathable. It isn't stretchy (although the sleeves have elastic), but it is very comfortable and fits tts. This is perfect for summer, but you can add leggings and boots for the winter or a large sweater for autumn.  It fits tts. I have an apple shape and this is very flattering with the v neck and 3/4 sleeves. The fabric is a little bit see through, nothing a slid can't fix.
Beautiful fabric and colors
Inner Package was ripped open. Color and print not at all like advertising. Also wrinkled

For once someone made an 1X that includes the arm size too. Nothing worse than buying a larger size but no one thinks that just maybe your arms are bigger too? Nice fabric, definitely have to wear a slip under it.
Too small
Fabric is so pretty. I love this dress I'm going to reorder a few more in different patterns
I am so glad I bought this dress. The material is perfect, fits great, love the colors,and I have gotten a ton of compliments. This is not stretchy so be sure to buy according to your size
Returned immediately.
Super cute, fits true to size. I’m 5’3, 135lbs and I ordered a small

Read reviews and kept with advise sizing.  Thought maybe should get small but was worried about the top.  5.4, 135 lbs 34C and got the medium. Perfect length and not tight in top.  If i got the small I think the top would be too tight and too short for office.
Perfect, light weight casual dress!

I bought this for beach vacation and it's perfect.  I'm 5'4" 165lb 38D and I ordered Lg & Md, I returned Lg because it seemed a big tent-ish for my taste.  Md is a wee bit snug in bust but VERY comfortable.  it hits just at top of knees so is perfect.  I'll wear thin stretchy bike shorts underneath for modesty because fabric is thin/ a bit see through but not vulgar.  in fact, the fabric is PERFECT- light weight and lovely color/ pattern.  I washed in garment bag on GENTLE, COLD and line dried-- all wrinkles and odor are gone. perfect, winner!

评论概述: beach cover up - what I needed
评论详情: I bought this as a swim suit cover up and beach dress.  It fits the bill nicely -  great colors, soft fabric, modest, sleeeves to keep the sun off,  no buttons or zippers.  It is perfect for walking the beach or dropping by a beach side cafe.  At 5 ft 1, the small is knee length

评论概述: Perfect blend of comfy and cute!
评论详情: Got this dress for my mom on her birthday and she got so many compliments! When it arrives it will come a little wrinkly due to packaging. Would recommend using a steamer on this material to remove crimping. Very cute and long enough where you’re not accidentally exposing anything when bending over as well.
OMG, Love, love, love!!!  Colors are true to photos and fit is fabulous!

I purchased one dress to stat with to make sure it fit well and I loved it. The seem under the breast area accentuates the waste without being tight. The material is light and flowy. The patterns in the material make it where you can't see underwear through the material. Patterns are cute and colors are accurate to Amazon images. I ordered three more of these dresses because I loved the fit and how it looked on me. I am 5'4'' and 190. Ordered XL. The length hits right above the knee.

评论概述: Great Dress But the Pattern was Inappropriate
评论详情: It was a nice fitting dress and I loved the patterns HOWEVER, the flower pattern at the breast level had one flower at each breast and landed right where the nipples would be.  I don't want to sound like a prude but it was just inappropriate.

I ordered the "Floral Blue White" which is more of a light teal color.  It is a Beautiful dress and I LOVE the fabric but, WOW is it SHORT.For the record I am 5' 1" and I am not comfortable with how short it is.  To be fair, I am bottom heavy and carry all my weight in my hips and thighs.  In the photo it looks like it hits just above the knee cap on the model.  Since I am so short, I presumed it would hit me at about the knee.  It hits well above the knee and shows a lot of my thigh chub.  When it arrived, I just tried it on over the Bermuda shorts I was wearing it it is shorter than the shorts.The ruffled seam at the top hit under my bust as expected.  Some have complained that it crossed their bust but I did not have that issue.  I do, however, have a short torso so it may not work for everyone.If you are blessed with slim smooth thighs or don't mind showing yours, it is a beautiful dress.

It's everything I expected. Beautiful material is silky. I would buy again in a different color

评论概述: Super comfy and cute! Lots of compliments!

Really cute dress. Love the style and fits perfectly. Bought a size med

Super cute , very comfortable,  I'm glad I bought it, I might buy it in another color.

This dress is so fun to wear!  Beautiful colors; modest neckline; nearly perfect fit for me (I’m a hard fit!). Hits just at knee.  Hand wash by itself and line dry so it doesn’t shrink. I hesitated about this dress until I saw my sister-in-law wear one like it. It is casual yet comfortable. Can be worn with a light sweater on chilly nights. Many patterns to choose from. Probably gonna purchase another!
This dress is so cute! The material is very soft and the colors are just as they appear online. I have already worn it but will be perfect to transition into fall! I have it in another color also!
Fit is perfect! I'm a 4-6, and the small fits just right.  Length is "age appropriate" for me; fabric quality is great.  Love the look!

I ordered this dress in a size XL … I wear a size 16 and it fit perfect. I was so pleased with this dress , the colours are vibrant and saturated , the floral designs were gorgeous and the style is very flattering when the dress is on. It’s perfect to wear with a pair of tennis shoes for a casual , pretty look or to dress it up with some fancier sandals and jewelry for a wedding , date night or girls night … it is so versatile in my wardrobe. I will get this in one or two more colour combos and would recommend it to anyone that likes a flowy bohemian style . The fabric was a bit wrinkled on arrival but it steamed out easily and travelled in my suitcase well.
The 2nd time I ordered this dress, they got it right.  It is right size and color and nice fabric.  This might be worth of another in a different color.

the fabric is so pretty, but meh when put on.  The sewing on the V-neck is too high up, and the length is too long.  It definitely doesn't look like the dress on the model. 评论概述: Love wearing it but I look like a cow
评论详情: I put this dress on to check the size as soon as it came in and it fit perfectly and felt wonderful. I normally wear an extra large but the large fits well. I'm 5'5", 184 lbs and a 38 D. The dress felt so good (light and airy) that I didn't even take it off to iron but wore around the house all evening. The colors are rich and beautiful. A few days later, I ironed it and put on to wear out and then got a good look in the mirror. OMG - I looked twice my size. Even my husband ,who strictly refrains from making any comments on my clothing that are not good, begged forgiveness but said I shouldn't wear this dress. Sigh. Otherwise, I love it. I will say that I was really surprised to find that it has bust darts and the pattern at the seams were matched up pretty well.
Cute dress, great colors.  Bodice has nice fit, sleeves a little more billowy than I wish

I had this dress in my cart for a while and finally decided to get it. The color is darker than what the picture actually looks like but I still really like it. I was on the fence as to what size to order as I normally wear a 14. I decided on the large and it fits me perfectly. Looking forward to wearing this with sandals this Summer.
I have really enjoyed this dress. It is well made and easy to care for. I have received many compliments when wearing this dress.

The colors are so cute. It’s very boho I love it. I’m sure I’ll get compliments it’s very striking and different. I bought my true size and it fits fine. The cut is perfect for a curvy body. It’s not see thru. It has no stretch to it. The length is at my knee, in 5’3”. The sleeves end in elastic, you can wear them down to 3/4 or push up to short and they will stay.
